codeSystems.name: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.title: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.description: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

codeSystems.name: LanguageCodesWithLanguageAndOptionallyARegionModifier
codeSystems.title: Language codes with language and optionally a region modifier
codeSystems.description: This value set includes codes from [BCP-47](http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47). This value set matches the ONC 2015 Edition LanguageCommunication data element value set within C-CDA to use a 2 character language code if one exists,   and a 3 character code if a 2 character code does not exist. It points back to [RFC 5646](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5646), however only the language codes are required, all other elements are optional.

codeSystems.name: UspsTwoLetterAlphabeticCodes
codeSystems.title: USPS Two Letter Alphabetic Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set defines two letter USPS alphabetic codes.

codeSystems.name: USCoreCommonSDOHAssessments
codeSystems.title: US Core Common SDOH Assessments ValueSet
codeSystems.description:
Common SDOH assessment concepts covering the following categories (Gravity Project SDOH Domains):
 - Food (Food Insecurity)
 - Housing (Housing Instability)
 - Health (Social Connection, Stress)
 - Employment (Employment Status)
 - Care (SDOH Category Unspecified)
 - Transit (Transportation Insecurity)
 - Money (Financial Insecurity)
 - Goods (Material Hardship)
 - Education (SDOH Category Unspecified)
 - Legal (SDOH Category Unspecified)

codeSystems.name: USCorePaCodesValueSet
codeSystems.title: US Core PA Codes ValueSet
codeSystems.description: A starter set of Physical Activity codes based off the [Physical activity IG](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/physical-activity/)
